de.fhg.fit.biomos.sensorplatform.tools

Class VirtualPolarH7Mock

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhg.fit.biomos.sensorplatform.sensorwrapper.ObservableSensorNotificationData
      • de.fhg.fit.biomos.sensorplatform.tools.VirtualPolarH7Mock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Gatttool, Runnable

    public class VirtualPolarH7Mock
extends ObservableSensorNotificationData
implements Gatttool
    This will simulate a gatttool with Polar H7 for running the Sensorplatform application on a Windows machine. For testing purposes only!!
    Author:
    Daniel Pyka
